name: Steve in the backrooms
description:
W A S D to move and arrow keys to look around and space to jump

avoid the entity and try to survive as much time as you can

if the game doesn't work instantly click the play button again

this is my first 3D game so pls no hate

and there might be alot of bugs

and the enemy is 2D cus uhhhhh i really dont know why  but yea
